channel.title: My screen doesn´t support the resolution.
channel.description:
Hello Black Mesa team and fans. When I went to play Black Mesa I changed the resolution of the screen to the last option, but my screen doesn't support that resolution. How I could change the screen resolution without run Black Mesa? I tried delete the BMS folder in source mods and install Black Mesa again but doesn' work. I am waiting for your answers. Thanks.
P.D.: Sorry if my English is bad.

item.title: My screen doesn´t support the resolution.
item.dc:creator: nestoreto
item.description:
eXitman:

right click on “black mesa” in steam library then go to “set launch options”
and you should write something like this:

-width 800 -height 600

where 800 and 600 are your desired width and height, then apply and launch the game

It works. Thanks for your quick reply
